history.proof: intros A B X Y f. unfold Included. intros b H. apply image_set_spec in H. destruct H as [a [H1 H2]]. apply Intersection_intro. - apply image_set_spec. exists a. qsimpl time: 1. - rewrite H2. apply image_set_intro. qsimpl time: 1 use: proj2.

ctx: intros A B X Y f.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type X, Y : Ensemble A f : A -> B b : B a : A H1 : Intersection A X Y a H2 : b = f a Unable to unify "Intersection A X Y a" with "X a".

ctx: intros A B X Y f.
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

ctx: intros A B X Y f.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall A B : Prop, A /\\ B -> B" on hypothesis of type "Intersection A X Y a".

ctx: intros A B X Y f.

original: intros A B X Y f. unfold Included. intros b H. apply image_set_spec in H. destruct H as [a [H1 H2]]. apply Intersection_intro. - apply image_set_spec. exists a. split; [apply H1|]. apply Intersection_intro. ++ apply proj1 in H1. apply H1. ++ apply proj2 in H1. apply H1. - rewrite H2. apply image_set_intro. apply proj2 in H1. apply H1.
